H0.text: What was the nickname of the French singer Edith Piaf. The French Nightingale

H1.text: What was the nickname of the French singer Edith Piaf. La Vie En Rose

H2.text: What was the nickname of the French singer Edith Piaf. The Parisian Songbird

H3.text: What was the nickname of the French singer Edith Piaf. Little Sparrow

A4.text: Leplée persuaded Piaf to sing despite her extreme nervousness. This nervousness and her height of only 142 centimetres (4 ft 8 in), inspired Leplée to give her the nickname La Môme Piaf, which is Paris slang for 'The Sparrow Kid'.

A5.text: Her singing when she met Leplée has been described as 'Comme un moineau' ('Like a Sparrow').
